CustomField.description: ** System Calculated ** Derived from the conditions of linked records related to the Log.
CustomField.formula:
HYPERLINK("/" & Id, OrderApi__System_Message__c) /* IF (OR(OrderApi__Subscription__c != null && ISPICKVAL(OrderApi__Type__c,'Subscription Activated'), OrderApi__Subscription__c != null && ISPICKVAL(OrderApi__Type__c,'Subscription Renewed')),
HYPERLINK("/" & Id, TEXT(OrderApi__Type__c) & " by " & OrderApi__User__r.FirstName & " " & OrderApi__User__r.LastName), HYPERLINK("/" & Id, TEXT(OrderApi__Type__c) & " by " & OrderApi__User__r.FirstName & " " & OrderApi__User__r.LastName))*/
CustomField.inlineHelpText: ** System Calculated ** Derived from the conditions of linked records related to the Log.
CustomField.label: Description
